column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Went here with Fiancé for brunch a few weekends ago
column2: and we enjoyed it a lot. It was quite busy
column4: and parking was hard to find. However
column6: and the coffee was better than a lot of places I've tried in Houston. I had the (pretentious?) avocado toast
column8: seedy toast and was piled with tasty delights: avocado
column11: poached egg. Fiancé had biscuits and gravy
column12: which had a mild jalapeño kick that added a little extra something to the dish. We finished it off with a black cherry cheesecake
column13: which was absolutely divine. Definitely want to go back.
